For accessing the audio file that will be decoded. Used by dir manager;.
for reporting after task is complete. Only for display use.

Makes NEW ODPCMAliasBlockFile or PCMAliasBlockFile depending on summary availability.

detaileddescription.para: returns true before decoding is complete, because it is linked to the encoded file until then. returns false afterwards.

If the summary has been computed, Construct a NEW PCMAliasBlockFile based on this one. otherwise construct an ODPCMAliasBlockFile that still needs to be computed.
newFileName
The filename to copy the summary data to.

briefdescription.para: Saves as xml ODPCMAliasBlockFile or PCMAliasBlockFile depending on summary availability.

detaileddescription.para: Writes the xml as a SimpleBlockFile if we can (if we have a summary file) Otherwise writes XML as a subset of attributes with 'odpcmaliasblockfile as the start tag. Most notably, the summaryfile attribute refers to a file that does not yet, so when the project file is read back in and this object reconstructed, it needs to avoid trying to open it as well as schedule itself for OD loading

briefdescription.para: Writes the summary file if summary data is available.
A public interface to WriteSummary.

detaileddescription.para: Write the summary to disk, using the derived ReadData() to get the data Here, the decoder ODTask associated with this file must fetch the samples with the ODDecodeTask::Decode() method.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value that indicates where the first sample in this block corresponds to the global sequence/clip. Only for display use.
Gets the value that indicates where the first sample in this block corresponds to the global sequence/clip. Only for display use.

memberdef.name: ReadData

briefdescription.para: Reads the specified data from the aliased file using libsndfile.

detaileddescription.para: Reads the specified data from the aliased file, using libsndfile, and converts it to the given sample format.

parameterdescription.para: The buffer to read the sample data into.
The format to convert the data into
The offset within the block to begin reading
The number of samples to read

briefdescription.para: Read the summary into a buffer.

detaileddescription.para: Read the summary of this alias block from disk. Since the audio data is elsewhere, this consists of reading the entire summary file.

parameterdescription.para: The buffer where the summary data will be stored. It must be at least mSummaryInfo.totalSummaryBytes long.

briefdescription.para: Returns the type of audiofile this blockfile is loaded from.
sets the amount of samples the clip associated with this blockfile is offset in the wavetrack (non effecting)

briefdescription.para: Allows reading of encoded file on other threads.

detaileddescription.para: Get the name of the file where the audio data for this block is stored.
Modify this block to point at a different file. This is generally looked down on, but it is necessary in one case: see DirManager::EnsureSafeFilename().

briefdescription.para: Reconstructs from XML a ODPCMAliasBlockFile and reschedules it for OD loading.

detaileddescription.para: Constructs a ODPCMAliasBlockFile from the xml output of WriteXML. Also schedules the ODPCMAliasBlockFile for OD loading.

memberdef.argsstring: (samplePtr buffer, sampleCount len, sampleFormat format) override
memberdef.name: CalcSummary

detaileddescription.para: A thread-safe version of CalcSummary. BlockFile::CalcSummary uses a static summary array across the class, which we can't use. Get a buffer containing a summary block describing this sample data. This must be called by derived classes when they are constructed, to allow them to construct their summary data, after which they should write that data to their disk file.
This method also has the side effect of setting the mMin, mMax, and mRMS members of this class.
Unlike BlockFile's implementation You SHOULD DELETE the returned buffer. this is protected so it shouldn't be hard to deal with - just override all BlockFile methods that use this method.

parameterdescription.para: A buffer containing the sample data to be analyzed
The length of the sample data
The format of the sample data.

briefdescription.para: An AliasBlockFile that references uncompressed data in an existing file.

detaileddescription.para: ODDecodeBlockFile is a special type of SimpleBlockFile that does not necessarily have summary OR audio data available The summary and audio is eventually computed and written to a file in a background thread.

ODDecodeBlockFile is a special type of SimpleBlockFile that does not necessarily have summary OR audio data available The summary is eventually computed and written to a file in a background thread. See ODPCMAliasBlockFile for a similar class.
Load On-Demand implementation of the SimpleBlockFIle for audio files that need to be decoded (mp3,flac,etc..).
Also, see ODPCMAliasBlockFile for a similar file.
